channel.title: Wow! I am happy
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2uzw3us.png[/img] After mining that [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2zp39qr.png[/img]
Do I get a prize :D!

item.title: Wow! I am happy
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:17, topic:379963”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=475806.msg3480148#msg3480148 date=1296047287]

[quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=475806.msg3480144#msg3480144 date=1296047019]

[quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=475806.msg3480137#msg3480137 date=1296046064]

the best is when u hit a vein of diamond running 10-20 deep, then while mining your way out of your small 2x2 hole you hit some lava.
(single player + inv editor) > (multiplayer)

Invedit is stupid, and it proves nothing.
It takes no time and effort.
[/quote]This is so true, why would you hack you’re inventory?
All the fun of searching days for it will be gone!

All of you little cheaters think it’s cool to have instant gratification. I bet you also LOVE spawn servers.
l2hardwork
[/quote]Are you accusing me of cheating or am i getting it wrong?

nahbah
[/quote]You know i wasn’t trollin[/quote]
Well…

[quote=“Cole1497, post:14, topic:379963”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=475806.msg3480093#msg3480093 date=1296041961]

the best is when u hit a vein of diamond running 10-20 deep, then while mining your way out of your small 2x2 hole you hit some lava.
(single player + inv editor) > (multiplayer)

Invedit is stupid, and it proves nothing.
It takes no time and effort.
[/quote]This is so true, why would you hack you’re inventory?
All the fun of searching days for it will be gone!

All of [size=18pt]you little cheaters[/size] think it’s cool to have instant gratification. I bet you also LOVE spawn servers.
l2hardwork[/quote]

Read full topic
